key: "What`s the matter,Tom? You look rather blue!"
text: “汤姆，发生什么了？ 你看上去脸都衰成蓝色了！”

key: "Blue! Say, Ned, I`d thrn red,green,yellow, or any other color of the rainbow,if I thought it would help matters any"
text: “蓝色？！ 听我说，尼德，要是我的问题能解决，哪怕让我的脸变成彩虹都可以！”

key: Ned Newton, the chum and companion of Tom Swift
text: 尼德·牛顿是汤姆斯威夫特的室友也是他的好伙伴
